item.description: FFFPOSTALSERVICE has presented its latest in-line collection today, and while it's a selection set for the Spring/Summer 2025 season, it might as well be from 2095. The Seoul-based brand â€“ whose sights remain set on the fashion of the future â€“ has mastered the intersection of avant grade and adaptable, staging another captivating collection that prioritizes protection and practicality.Entitled â€œ Eliâ€çš„èŒƒå›´åœ¨å…¶17ä¸ªå¤–è§‚ä¸­ä»¥å¯åˆ†å±‚å’Œæ¾æ•£çš„è½®å»“é—ªé—ªå‘å…‰ã€‚é™è½ä¼å¤¹å…‹é…å¤‡äº†éšè—å¼å¼•æ“ç›–ï¼Œè€ŒAire Multi Pocketå¤¹å…‹æ‹¥æœ‰å……è¶³çš„å†…éƒ¨å’Œå¤–éƒ¨å£è¢‹ã€‚ Waxed cotton MA-1 zip-ups take a more utilitarian approach, arriving alongside tracksuit sets and maroon zip-up hoodies finished off with a curved zipper.As for pants, "ELI" focuses on cargo, presenting a pair of zip-up cargo trousers elevated with an innovative three-way zipper and three additional wide-legged options, built in with secure zip closure and scattered pocketing.ä¸€æ¡æ—¥æœ¬ç‰›ä»”è£¤å­éå¸ƒæœè£…ï¼Œä¸ºè¯¸å¦‚è¿å¸½å›´å·¾å’Œä¸€æ¡æ‰“èœ¡çš„æ£‰èŠ±è´§ç‰©æŠ€æœ¯slingbagä¹‹ç±»çš„é…ä»¶è®©è·¯ã€‚ href =â€œ https://hypebeast.com/2025/3/fffpostalservice-ss25-collection-collection-lookbook-rease-rease-info-spring-summer-2025â€ rel =â€œ noopenerâ€ target =â€œ _ blackâ€ hypebeast

item.description: On Wednesday, Apple revealed its latest MacBook Air, a high-performance upgrade of the "world's most popular laptop" with the blazing-fast M4 chip that comes in an all-new "Sky Blue" colorway.The powerful device is equipped with up to 18 hours of battery life, a new 12MP Center Stage camera, 16GB of starting unified memory and all the functions of macOS Sequoia with Apple æ™ºåŠ›ã€‚ â€œå¤©è“è‰²â€é…è‰²ä¸â€œåˆå¤œâ€ï¼Œâ€œæ˜Ÿå…‰â€çš„ç°æœ‰é˜µå®¹å’Œâ€œé“¶è‰²â€è‰²è°ƒç›¸ç»“åˆï¼Œä½œä¸ºé‡‘å±é¥°é¢æœ€å…·å†’é™©ç²¾ç¥çš„è‰²è°ƒã€‚ç¬”è®°æœ¬ç”µè„‘å¸¦æœ‰10æ ¸CPUï¼Œæœ€å¤š10æ ¸GPUï¼Œæœ€å¤šå¯æä¾›10æ ¸GPUï¼Œå¹¶æä¾›é«˜è¾¾32GBçš„ç»Ÿä¸€è®°å¿†ã€‚ The new MacBook Air is up to two times faster than the M1 model, and when compared to the fastest Intel-based MacBook Air, the new device is up to 23 times quicker.Additionally, with Apple Intelligence, the updated laptop allows users to create emojis with Genmoji, find more dynamic language with Writing Tools, change between spoken and text requests via Siri and simplify more day-to-day functions.Notably, the new MacBook Air comes at a lowerèµ·ä»·æ¯”å…¶å‰èº«çš„èµ·ä»·ï¼Œå…¶13è‹±å¯¸ç‰ˆæœ¬ä¸º999ç¾å…ƒï¼Œ15è‹±å¯¸å‹å·èµ·ä»·ä¸º1,199ç¾å…ƒã€‚è¯¥è®¾å¤‡ç°åœ¨å¯ç”¨äºé¢„è®¢ã€‚ä»”ç»†æŸ¥çœ‹ä¸Šé¢ç”»å»Šä¸­è‹¹æœçš„æ–°MacBook Airã€‚ hypebeastçš„ç”»å»Š
